pageContext.claim: “After years of stagnation, the United States is once again experiencing strong economic growth.”
pageContext.analysis: The U.S. economy in Trump's first year grew little faster (2.3 percent increase in the gross domestic product) than the average over President Obama's second term (2.2 percent) or the average over the previous ten years (2.2 percent). Indeed, 2017 will place 11th in GDP growth over the last two decades.
